description.description: More information on the problem and solution. Or, the error message from backend.
description.example: ORIGINAL ERROR: E1234 ORIGINAL ERROR MESSAGE

traceId.description: More information on the problem and solution. Or, the error message from backend.
traceId.example: ORIGINAL ERROR: E1234 ORIGINAL ERROR MESSAGE

userId.description: user id who done this action

TaskActionHistoryDto.description: List of an action has already done in this task

litigationId.description: litigation id related to this task

litigationCaseId.description: litigation id related to this task

financialId.description: litigation case id related to this task

customerId.description: financial id related to this task

userId.description: customer id related to this task

endDate.description: date on final action has been done

daysSpent.description: total day spent on this task

daysSla.description: Amount of day(s) that this task need to be done

attributes.description: Some data that need to pass through between action on task

taskActionHistories.description: List of an action has already done in this task

dashboard.description: LEXS_FINISHED_DOCUMENT, LEXS_PENDING_NOTICE, LEXS_PENDING_LITIGATION, LITIGATION_FINISHED_DOCUMENT, LITIGATION_PENDING_NOTICE, LITIGATION_PENDING_LITIGATION, ALL, ALL_PENDING_NOTICE, ALL_PENDING_LITIGATION, ALL_FINISHED_DOCUMENT

id.description: 0 for add new, # > 0 for update court trial

actionFlag.description: deprecated:  court trial id  task attribute

updateFlag.description: A add or U update; for court trial

statusDashboard.description: ALL, STATUS_APPROVE, STATUS_NOTICE, STATUS_IN_PROGRESS, STATUS_DEFER, STATUS_ADJUDICATION, STATUS_SEIZURED, STATUS_WRIT_OF_EXECUTION, STATUS_AUCTION, STATUS_DEFER_EXECUTION, STATUS_ASSET_INVESTIGATION

caseGroupKey.description: Group keys are: civil_court_black_case_no or id

collateralLexsStatusDashboard.description: ALL_COLLATERAL_LEXS_STATUS, COLLATERAL_LEXS_STATUS_PLEDGE, COLLATERAL_LEXS_STATUS_SEIZURED, COLLATERAL_LEXS_STATUS_ON_SALE, COLLATERAL_LEXS_STATUS_PENDING_SALE, COLLATERAL_LEXS_STATUS_SOLD

referenceId.description: Expense No,  Receive No,   Advance Receive No

referenceRequestType.description: Currently, this field apply only financialObjectType = 'RECEIVE' possible value = SUSPENSE_COURT, SUSPENSE, INTER_OFFICE, AUTO_CLEARING
